languages.text: "Полагаю, исключение было сделано лишь для одного человека — не советую проверять границы дозволенного в свете новой информации".
"I assume an exception was made for one specific individual — I still do not recommend pushing the boundaries of what is permissible, even in light of this new information."
languages.original_text: "Полагаю, исключение было сделано лишь для одного человека — не советую проверять границы дозволенного в свете новой информации".

traits.locale_text: "I assume an exception was made for one specific individual — I do not recommend pushing the boundaries of what is permissible in light of this new information."
"I assume an exception was made for one specific individual — I do not recommend pushing the boundaries of what is permissible in light of this new information."
"I assume an exception was made for one specific individual — I still do not recommend pushing the boundaries of what is permissible, even in light of this new information."
"I assume an exception was made for one specific individual — I still do not recommend pushing the boundaries of what is permissible, even in light of this new information."
"I assume an exception was made for one specific individual — I still do not recommend pushing the boundaries of what is permissible, even in light of this new information."
"I assume an exception was made for one specific individual — I still do not recommend pushing the boundaries of what is permissible, even in light of this new information."

languages.text: 「特定の一人に対して例外が設けられたと俺は推測する。だがこの新しい情報があっても、許される範囲の限界を超えることは推奨しない」
languages.original_text: "I assume an exception was made for one specific individual — I still do not recommend pushing the boundaries of what is permissible, even in light of this new information."

traits.locale_text: 「特定の一人に対して例外が設けられたと俺は推測する。だがこの新しい情報があっても、許される範囲の限界を超えることは推奨しない」

languages.text: "Ich nehme an, für ein spezielles Individuum wurde eine Ausnahme gemacht – ich empfehle nach wie vor nicht, die Grenzen des Möglichen auszureizen, auch nicht angesichts der neuen Information."
languages.original_text: "I assume an exception was made for one specific individual — I still do not recommend pushing the boundaries of what is permissible, even in light of this new information."

traits.locale_text: "Ich nehme an, für ein spezielles Individuum wurde eine Ausnahme gemacht – ich empfehle nach wie vor nicht, die Grenzen des Möglichen auszureizen, auch nicht angesichts der neuen Information."

languages.text: «Supongo que ha hecho una excepción para una persona concreta. Sigo recomendando que no ponga a prueba sus límites a pesar de esta nueva información».
languages.original_text: "I assume an exception was made for one specific individual — I still do not recommend pushing the boundaries of what is permissible, even in light of this new information."

traits.locale_text: «Supongo que ha hecho una excepción para una persona concreta. Sigo recomendando que no ponga a prueba sus límites a pesar de esta nueva información».

languages.text: “据我猜测，那位监察官仅仅会对某个特别的人破例。因此，即便得到了这些新的情报，我也不建议跨过许可界限。”
languages.original_text: "I assume an exception was made for one specific individual — I still do not recommend pushing the boundaries of what is permissible, even in light of this new information."

traits.locale_text: “据我猜测，那位监察官仅仅会对某个特别的人破例。因此，即便得到了这些新的情报，我也不建议跨过许可界限。”

languages.text: "Belirli bir kişi için istisna yapılmış sanırım... Yine de bu yeni bilgiye rağmen neyin caiz olup olmadığı konusunda sınırları zorlama derim"
languages.original_text: "I assume an exception was made for one specific individual — I still do not recommend pushing the boundaries of what is permissible, even in light of this new information."

traits.locale_text: "Belirli bir kişi için istisna yapılmış sanırım... Yine de bu yeni bilgiye rağmen neyin caiz olup olmadığı konusunda sınırları zorlama derim"

languages.original_text: "I assume an exception was made for one specific individual — I still do not recommend pushing the boundaries of what is permissible, even in light of this new information."

languages.text: « Je présume qu'une exception a été faite pour un individu en particulier... Cela dit, je ne recommande pas de tester les limites de ce qui est permis, même à la lumière de ces nouvelles informations. »
languages.original_text: "I assume an exception was made for one specific individual — I still do not recommend pushing the boundaries of what is permissible, even in light of this new information."

traits.locale_text: « Je présume qu'une exception a été faite pour un individu en particulier... Cela dit, je ne recommande pas de tester les limites de ce qui est permis, même à la lumière de ces nouvelles informations. »
